name: Arboreity
description:
People don't spend enough time in trees nowadays. Despite them being a perfect place for meditation, self-reflection and escaping the rush of our everyday lives, we rarely climb onto treetops anymore, due to a lack of time or the fear to fall down. "Arboreity" sets out to remind ourselves of the inherent beauty of sitting in trees and asks every player to consider experiencing the real thing again.

Concept and Art: Nina Kiel

Programming and animation import: Dario D'Ambra

Additional sound, mixing and motion capture: Rafael Martínez Jausoro

Project management: Su-jin Song

3D character model: Malte Dittmann

Sky box: Mia Vujicic

Sound: Caitlin Kearney, kyster at freesound.org
